title: Add New Learning Resoure
description:
Hello Solr Team,

I have created a video course on Apache Solr. I have it hosted on Udemy and QScutter. I have attached the links

http://qscutter.com/course/learn-apache-solr-with-big-data-and-cloud-computing/

https://www.udemy.com/learn-apache-solr-with-big-data-and-cloud-computing/

I have a lots of positive reviews. I see a lots of resources on your official site so can you please list one too. It will help beginners to get started with Solr easily.

Thanks.
